reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación y atención. Departamento muy bonito, limpio y seguro.

El departamento es hermoso, decorado con buen gusto, mucha luz, limpio y prolijo, excelente ubicación. La recepción impecable, Ralf muy simpático y Marcelo fue muy amable, nos brindo toda la información necesaria para nuestra estadía, estuvimos cómodas, regresaremos seguro!

El departamento es tal cual como se ve en las fotografias, excelente recepcion, moderno, seguro, limpio y cerca del metro.
Excelente comunicacion con el anfitrion, nos concedieron un late check out sin cargo.
Excelente Dto y muy amable Ralf, todo Fantastico

Excelente departamento, tal cual lo publicado.
El anfitrión se portó de maravillas, tuvimos problemas con la tarjeta de crédito  y de igual manera pudimos concretar, gracias a su buena predisposición. 
Muy recomendable!!!
Todo muy bien, el apartamento tal como sale en las fotos, comodo y central...muy atentos desde el inicio hasta el final

Es un lugar muy bien ubicado, muy cerca del Metro, y el departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. El recibimiento es muy grato, con frutas de regalo, el departamento tiene cosas básicas como té, café, azúcar, etc. y nos prestaron una tarjeta del subte que fue muy útil. Súper recomendable.

el apartamento y las instalaciones del edificio son preciosas.
la ubicación es inmejorable y Ralf prestó atención a todos los detalles.
Marcelo como siempre hizo un recibimiento puntual y detallado. El gesto de la fruta es un toque muy agradable. Gracias
Muy buenos anfitriones, el apartamento es tal cual las fotos, hicieron todo lo posible para q nuestra estadia fuera lo mejor. Gracias
Muchas gracias, Ralf es un gran ser humano nos hizo sentir como en casa , me gustaría regresar, el lugar es bonito, cómodo y tiene todo  necesario gracias

El departamento espectacular, muy lindo y con todo lo necesario que uno necesita.
La ubicación muy buena, cerca de supermercados y restorantes.
Marcelo, que nos recibió, muy amable y dándonos toda la información necesaria para nuestra estadía, incluso hasta tarjeta para el subte, por si queríamos usarlo.
Hasta nos regalo un vino, ya que mi marido estaba de cumpleaños.
Nos encanto, lo recomendaría de todas maneras.

El apartamento luce igual a lo que se muestra en las fotos. Está en perfecto estado y tienes todo lo que puedas necesitar para cocinar, aunque mejor salir a conocer Palermo. Además, el edificio dispone de un buen sistema de seguridad y vigilancia, por lo que te sientes muy tranquilo. Está muy bien comunicado por metro (Subte) con el centro de la ciudad y a la llegada se nos ofreció mapas y orientación básica de la ciudad. ¡Gracias!

Soy una estudiante francesa y me quede 12 días en Pool Party. El depto es muy lindo, exactamente como en las fotos. Es muy cómodo y limpio, con mucho luz, y decorado con muy buen gusto. Está a dentro de una tour muy moderna donde pude disfrutar del spa y del gimnasio que están al piso 32 y de donde la vista sobre la ciudad es increíble. 
El servicio de seguridad abierto 24h/24 y de limpieza eran perfectos.
La tour esta muy bien ubicada en Palermo, cerca de todas las líneas de colectivo, del subte en plaza Italia, y de muchos restaurantes, cafés, bares, locales etc muy lindos. Ademas, lo que es cómodo es que hay muchos supermercados muy cerca del edificio!  
Ralf y Marcelo son muy simpáticos, me dieron la bienvenida cuando llegue, me ayudaron con mis maletas, y siempre estuvieron muy disponibles cuando lo necesité!! 
Entonces recomiendo mucho este depto!

Perfecta estadía, muy cómodo el apartamento, ideal para una pareja. Y nos dejaron café, fruto y otros comestibles que fueron muy útiles. Está muy cerca de una estación de metro y también del centro turístico de Palermo. Recomendable.

Una experiencia mas que gratificante.... Excelente comunicación desde el primer mensaje. Los anfitriones súper responsables, atentos en todo momento. El depto es hermoso, todo funciona correctamente. Muy cómodo y la mejor ubicación. Marcelo nos estaba esperando cuando llegamos y nos explico con lujo de detalle todo sobre el depto, seguridad y barrio... La mejor experiencia en Bs As...

El departamento está muy bien ubicado, si lo que se quiere es estar cerca de tiendas de diseño y ropa, además de entretenidos restoranes.
Agradezco a Ralf por la hospitalidad y las facilidades para los traslados al aeropuerto.
Todo perfecto. Marcelo estaba esperándonos al llegar y todo fue genial. El apartamento divino. Cómodo y no le faltaba nada! La ubicación es muy buena. Volvería sin duda en mis visitas a Buenos Aires!
Nos recibieron a la hora acordada, todo en orden, bebidas y fruta. Son un equipo muy organizado y la suite es tal cual aparece en las fotos, todo impecable.

Muy bien todo. Ralf fue muy amable y un gran anfitrión. El apartamento 
estaba muy bien situado y lo encontré muy limpio. Fue una estancia maravillosa, gracia Ralf

Ralf and his team are were very friendly. I also had extra wishes like cleaning service every day and for a very low fee.
His staff is trustworthy and i can definitely recommend his company. (I say this as a traveller of 6 years)

We have been super nicely welcome drom Ralf and his team, he took the time to give us many tips for our stay which ended up as great insiders ones! The appartment has everything needed for your stay and was tiny clean. The location in Palermo is perfect, near to the best restaurant by walking distance but at the same time in a quiet area. We definitely recommend this place!

It is a lovely little studio in a great building. The pool and gym are excellent. The location is good, Palermo is a really fun area. However the studio is about a 15 min walk from the heart of the action. 
We had been travelling for a month so were keen to use the washing machine but it was a bit to complicated to get the correct coins/tokens for the communal one. We ended up getting it done externally
Amazing place to stay! Clean and new. Ralf was amazing and resourceful.

We had an awesome stay here! Loved the location in Palermo. Very safe building. Ralf and his team were super thorough and accommodating. The space was very well decorated and had all of the amenities you would ever need. We loved hanging by the pool one afternoon. Would absolutely stay here again.

I have been in several places in Buenos Aires, but the overall experience in this apartment is certainly the best I have had so far. The location couldn't be any better, is 3 minutes walking from subway, train station and buses. The building is spotless with extremely high, luxury standard, and the staff is very nice and always helpful. The apartment was clean, bright, stylish and fully equipped for what I needed. Sincerely, I couldn't ask for anything more and I will stay there again when I come back.
Nice flat with good location. Ralf was very welcoming
Very safe, clean apartment in central Palermo. 5-6 blocks from some awesome hot spots. Book this now!

O local é muito bom
Minha casa em Buenos Aires. Localização , limpeza , conforto 
Enfim, tudo maravilhoso

If you are looking for exquisite service, concierge-quality support and an apartment in the best location in BA, please do not hesitate to book with Ralf and his team of colleagues. They offer a superior, white-glove service; the apartment was pristine and perfectly located in Palermo Soho. Ralf was always on hand for advice, support or just a chat - very pleased indeed with the choice I made. David (UK).

Ralf's apartment is BEAUTIFUL and so nicely decorated. I walked in and felt relaxed and at home right away. It has everything one could need for a comfortable stay and communication with Ralf and his team was perfect. The area is great. Easy to walk everywhere (if you like walking). The gym on the 31st floor is a nice bonus. The only thing I recommend for light sleepers: not a bad idea to bring ear plugs. As it is a new building, you can hear the neighbors and the one above is quite active. But with my ear plugs, I slept like a baby on a cloud.
Ralf and his team are Incredible hosts. Highly recommended!

This is a nice studio apartment, clean, cozy and comfortable for two people. We loved the location and walking around the neighbourhood. So many conveniences are nearby and it is a great base from which to explore Buenos Aires. There is some noise from other apartments but it's not that surprising, that would be true anywhere in Buenos Aires. Ralf and his team are very organized and professional, and helpful if you ever need anything.
Very nice place and friendly host. Very cool area to hangout and awesome gym alt the 31st floor!
Great jumping off point in Palermo!
The apartment is new, well located, decorated and equipped. Great space for a couple.
This big, well lit studio (plus good bathroom) was excellent for a week's stay. The apartment is well equipped and most comfortable. We felt secure and welcome.

We stayed in The Pool Party apartment for four nights and had a wonderful visit.  The apartment is clean, well appointed, safe, quite, and very comfortable.  Perhaps the best part of the apartment is getting all of the tips from Ralf about the local dinning scene.  We aware able to walk to almost everything that we wanted to see, and when we decided not to walk, the apartment is very close to the subway line.  If we could give this location more than 5 Stars we would.
Beautiful clean space with a well equipped kitchen,  easy access to public transport and shops. Would definitely stay again thanks for a great stay

Ralf was quick to respond to my enquiry, and took the time during check-in to explain both the apartment and the area. A great host, I would highly recommend the apartment - the added bonus of the pool is a winner too!
Perfect flat that provides anything you need within the amazing neighbourhood of Palermo! Fantastic view from the house's gym over the city. Thank you Ralf - always ready to come back to this place!

We stayed at the Pool Party for about a week. The best part about our stay was for sure Ralf and the team, their warm welcome (fresh fruits and music on our way in!), massive flexibility in changing dates and with late-check in and in storing our suitcases while we went away on a weekend trip.  The location was absolutely perfect, close to the metro, best shops, restaurants, supermarkets, and nightlife. The apartment was super clean, very well spaced and designed and the gym and pool area are stunning! 100% the best experience we have ever had on Airbnb, these are true pros, not your random host! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!

We loved our stay in Buenos Aires. The apartment was perfect, as described, in a superb location. We availed of the pool every day of our stay,too. Arrangements all ran smoothly and Ralf responded immediately to us. A special thanks to Marcelo, too, for giving us a helpful and enthusiastic introduction to the apartment. We would love to return.

It was outstanding. Both Marcelo and Ralf were wonderful and I understand why they are superhosts. They were so accommodating from day one. The apartment and building was lively and in a perfect area in Palermo. I would absolutely want to stay there again when I go back to BA.
This was a great small studio. Amazing location and very personalized attention. 5 stars host all around !! The host is amazing !!

If you want to be a central location, near great restaurants and public transportation, this is the place. The place is clean, modern, and in very sercure building (if you're worried about that).  The place was perfect for us, and Ralf was an amazing host. Ralf provided great tips, recommended great places to drink and eat where we met new friends (locals and visitors). The apartment is modern, cozy, has wifi and a view of the pool. Would recommend this apartment to any of my friends.

Host was waiting for me when I arrived (after having arranged transport for me from airport, highly recommended). Great explanation, great english, they had a nice map for me. It's just as nice as the photos appear.

Ralf was very helpful and efficient.
Flat is perfectly located and full equipped.
O apartamento foi perfeito, bem localizado, limpo confortável , a comunicação com ralph foi sempre fácil .otima opção em Buenos Aires

Simplesmente perfeito! O apartamento é exatamente como está nas fotos, a localização é perfeita e a estrutura do prédio é sensacional. Fui algumas vezes a Buenos Aires e posso atestar que este é o melhor lugar para se hospedar na cidade! Ralf e sua equipe são extremamente atenciosos e prestativos e estão sempre à disposição dos hóspedes. Não pense duas vezes antes de alugar este espaço! Quando voltar a Buenos Aires, já sei onde ficar!

The apartment is exactly as you see in the photos. It is clean , comfortable and very nicely decorated , check in was very easy and very detailed.  The apartment is very professionally managed and the  location is excellent in the Palermo neighborhood  full of restaurants and cafes. If I come back to Buenos Aires , I will definitely stay here again.
The place was really clean and modern! Great location! Exc deal for what you pay!

The apartment was great! Very clean, just as beautiful as the photos show, and in a great neighborhood close to some amazing restaurants and plazas. Ralf and Marcelo did a great job of providing recommendations, instructions for the apartment and amenities, and making us feel welcome. We also loved having access to the gym and sauna!

This was our first experience with AirBnB. It was a great apartment and much nicer than being in a hotel. Will definitely book through Airbnb in the future. The apartment was clean and extremely safe, we felt very comfortable when here and not worried about our belongings in the apartment. The kitchen had everything you'd need to make dinner or cook leftovers and make drinks. The balcony was nice and the apartment was quiet.

We had a fantastic stay at Ralf's apartment. We arrived late, but were still greeted with a smile and a hug :) Everything was well explained to us and we felt very secure with the location/building. The apartment itself is very clean and in a central location. We definitely recommend it for anyone coming to Buenos Aires!!

Opção incrivel em Palermo. Se gostaram das fotos e da localização, podem ficar aqui tranquilos. Apto impecável, super bem equipado, tudo de bom gosto, não houve nada que precisássemos que não estivesse à nossa disposição. Pessoal super atencioso no momento da chegada, tiveram o cuidado de disponibilizar frutas, água e até um cartão para uso do transporte publico.
Para quem quer explorar Palermo, a localização é perfeita, tudo a poucas quadras.
Para quem quer explorar BsAs, idem, ao lado da Plaza Italia, onde há o subte, onibus e taxis à vontade.

It was my first time in Buenos Aires. With Ralf's hospitality it is going to be one of the most memorable vacations I've ever had. Yes, I traveled around the world and yes, Buenos Aires is no longer Paris of South America, but staying at Ralf's apartment made a huge difference. Centrally located, clean and safe, host and his staff members so hospitable and responsive, I've got nothing to complain but to say "thank you guys it was wonderful!" I miss it already. I loved walking around the neighborhoods as much as sightseeing hot spots in the city. If I ever return, I will make sure I stay at Ralf's apartment again!! : D

O apartamento é ótimo, super confortável, bem localizado, tem absolutamente tudo que precisamos (inclusive telefone para ligações locais) e o prédio possui boa infraestrutura e segurança. Porém o diferencial deste apartamento é o serviço prestado pelo anfitrião: fomos extremamente bem recebidos pelo Marcelo que não só nos explicou o funcionamento de tudo no apartamento e no prédio, como foi super gentil nos dando frutas, garrafa de água, mapa da cidade e cartão do metro. Além disso, a comunicação com o anfitrião foi atenciosa e rápida desde antes de efetuarmos a reserva! Realmente tivemos uma experiência incrível com este aluguel: ficou acima das nossas expectativas! Altamente recomendável!

My fiance and I really enjoyed our stay! When we arrived, Marcel was there to greet us. The apartment was just as nice and clean as the listing photos and description.  Marcel spent a generous amount of time with us and provided plenty of tips and recommendations for us. 

We loved the location! It is conveniently located near Plaza Italia so you can easily hop on the subway. It is also just a few blocks away from the wonderful shopping and dining of Palermo.

I would absolutely stay here again. Thanks for making our trip to Buenos Aires wonderful, Marcel and Ralf!

This was without doubt one of the best places that I stayed on my whole 8-month trip. A wonderful slice of Palermo high living, I couldn't have asked for a better experience. The welcome was very professional - better than that of a top hotel - and all the attention to detail was very impressive. A complimentary bowl of fruit. A lovelh balcony. A gym to enjoy with stunning views of the city. A bed I never wanted to leave. Great cable TV options and choices. A modern bathroom. A well-equipped kitchen and a very comfortable living room area. Top recommendation.

Completely wonderful stay. Very easy with a great introductory tour, tons of amenities, and a superb location. A short taxi ride from the airport, very close to plaza italia with many bus stops and the subway nearby. Palermo is safe and has many restaurants/shops around, and is safe. The apartment is beautiful inside, with a nice view from the 1st (US 2nd) floor balcony.

My boyfriend and I stayed here during our trip to Buenos Aires and highly recommend Ralf and his team. The location was fantastic and the apartment has FANTASTIC security.  Ralf's team picked us up from the airport and greeted us with a personable and helpful orientation. They went above and beyond with little details to make us feel comfortable, like coffee, snacks, and a hair drier, which was SUCH a game changer, as mine didn't work. Highly recommend! FIVE STARS!

We were very happy with Ralf's hospitality. He made us feel welcome when we arrived and gave us some good tips to start exploring the city. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed - all in all a lovely stay.

This was a great home away from home. We were in BA for a wedding and quick tour of Argentina. Ralf was very flexible and accomodated our late arrival so we didn't have to miss out on plans due to a cancelled flight. His associate Marcello was absolutely great and, despite us checking in after midnight on a weekday, he took his time going over the apartment features, giving us tips and making sure we were comfortable. They even had some bottled water and fresh fruit waiting for us which is a little touch that can go a long way for a weary traveler! The building is amazingly secure and in a very safe neighborhood with lots to see and do. We would absolutely stay here again!
Great place, very roomy, nice pool a super safe building. Liked the area as well not a far walk from the metro or good restaurants. 100% recommend.

We had a great experience renting this apartment. BA4U provides all the necessary information and we were greeted by a very thorough presentation and tour of the unit and building. the unit was very clean and well-equipped. It is in a great location in the Palermo Soho neighborhood. Overall, an excellent experience.
Ralf was a great host -- extremely helpful and easy to coordinate with.

What a wonderful place to stay in Buenos Aires! The apartment was exactly as pictured, the perfect little place to spend a week. I didn't meet Ralf but Marcelo met me at the apartment as scheduled and gave me a very detailed explanation of how everything worked (kitchen appliances, TV, air conditioner, etc.). He showed me the gym and spa, both with a spectacular view, and also explained how the entry into the apartment complex worked (there's a security guard at the entrance). He pointed out everything I needed to know - where the closest cash machine was, where I could buy a SIM card, and where I could get groceries. In sum, when he left I was fully confident to begin my explorations!

I had a really nice stay here, Palermo Soho is a great place from which to explore many areas of the city. I had a superb week and this apartment certainly contributed a lot to it.

Appartement impeccable, prestation haut de gamme et emplacement idéale pour visiter buenos Aires.
mieux qu'un hôtel, je recommande vivement

Ralf's apartment is located in a great area with superb security and a very safe feel. We had a very warm welcome and introduction to the apartment by Andres he was very knowledgable about the area and recommended us a fantastic restaurant where we had the best meal of our time in South America so far. Spent a few hours relaxing by the pool and enjoying the sun. Close to a subway line and a great base for attractions in the area of Palermo. The apartment was exactly as the pictures portray and we felt very at home while we were there. Would defiantly recommend booking this apartment you will not be disappointed.

We had a wonderful stay at Ralf's apartment in Palermo Soho. It was exactly as pictured and had everything we needed.  We booked for 3 nights but it was so easy to live here we stayed for 5.  We used the gym and the pool, both were great to have during our stay. The location was great and Ralf includes a terrific house manual that includes tips for restaurants, bars, laundromats etc in the area. Ralf was very easy to get along with during the whole process, booking, check in and during our stay.  Thank you! We hope to come again!

We stayed at one of Ralf's places from January 10th to 14th. He has been one of the most helpful and kindest people we have met so far in Argentina. The place is amazing, super clean and comfortable bed and enough of everything to make your stay perfect. It looks exactly like the picture, if not better. We are driving through Argentina and Ralf and Andy were both very helpful in regards to our trip and destinations and directions. Thank you both, we can not wait to come back and stay with you again.

Ralf was very accommodation, originally agreed to give me the keys at 6am when my flight was arriving then when my flight had an 18 hour delay he managed to arrange a drop off at 2am the following day.

The apartment is great and has everything one might need, its located in Palermo and has great transport links to bus, subway and national airport very close by. 

Large pool downstairs to enjoy and the gym is on the 31st floor with a spectacular view of the city.

Absolutely Fantastic! The apartment was just like the photos with so many bonuses!  It was clean and so comfortable.  The location was perfect.  Andres made us feel at home and showed us everything we needed from maps to adapters for electronics.  I was so pleased to find a blender too for my morning health shakes. We loved the pool and were able to see the most INCREDIBLE fireworks on New Years Eve from the top floor.  That was unforgettable.  We LOVED our stay here and would recommend it to anyone!
Un bel appartement propre, fonctionnel, bien équipé et bien situé. Un très bon service de l'hôte et de son équipe. La piscine est un bel atout. Nous avons été ravi de notre séjour.
We had a great time at the Pool Party apartment. Ralf was extremely welcoming and helpful in explaining everything about the apartment. The pictures are very accurate also.

A great apartment in an ideal location. It was everything we wanted. The bundling amenities were awesome and enjoyed hanging around the pool. I would definitely suggest you this apartment to any couple heading to BA. Ralf is awesome too and he provides you with a ton of useful information.

Ralf was such a great host. Made us feel at home the minute we arrived. He has everything in order from a complete book with information about the apt, to restaurant recommendations. The apt was very clean and exactly how it looked on the website. And may I add, the bed was very comfortable!! I will definitely stay with him again.

Amazing experience from the beginning through the end. I wish AirBnB had an option for 6 stars, because this experience was so far beyond any other AirBnB experience I've ever had. 
The worries we have when we use AirBnB is 1) the apartment-- what if its not as nice as the photos suggest; 2) the location-- what if I'm stuck in a bad or un fun part of town; 3) the hosts: especially when traveling abroad, how will I know how to get around / where to go without a front desk to ask?
Well, the apartment was even nicer than the photos suggest-- rooftop gym and jacuzzi, outdoor pool, 24 hour security, amazing! The neighborhood is PERFECT. The heart of a fun but quiet area perfect for walking and exploring. And 2 minutes to the subway. But most importantly, Ralf and his team (Marcello and Adriana) were AMAZING. They communicated excellently in English before we arrived, explained all the details of the apartment/neighborhood, provided FANTASTIC restaurant recommendations, even helped us book a tango show and track down a dinner reservation last minute. I have stayed at 5 star hotels that fell far short of the experience Ralf and his team provide. I cannot recommend this apartment enough. 
I like to be balanced, so have tried to think of cons of staying here, but the ONLY one I can think of is that I have been thoroughly spoiled and am sure my next AirBnB experience will fall short of this one.

This is a really great apartment - light, bright and clean with a nice looking balcony over the fantastic swimming pool. Ralph and all his colleagues were great to deal with and were kind at check-in. There was a super useful binder of information in the apartment. Nice neighbourhood too.

Their staff over the phone and via email were very attentive and helpful. Marcelo was great! He helped us settle into the apartment and he took his time to explain the apartment's features. He was also very knowledgeable about the immediate area and was quick to respond when we needed help. The apartment's location was prime. It's located close to the Subte and walking distance to the best parts of Palermo. The building has beautiful views of Buenos Aires on the 31st floor, highly recommend! Thanks Ralf, Marcelo, and Sandra for everything! We'll definitely stay here again if we were to return!
Ralf war ein toller Gastgeber und die Unterkunft kann nur empfohlen werden, schöne Gegend und schöne Wohnung. In einer für uns schwierigen Situation hat uns Ralf besonders geholfen.

My girlfriend and I had a fantastic 5 days in the flat, cooking was easy, eating out near by was amazing and Ralf was the perfect host - he  recommended everything we could have needed and it was all close by. With a underground stop a couple of mins away it was really easy to get into the centre of town and do some sight seeing too. Stay here, you won't regret it!
Ralf and his staff were very thorough and great about our stay!

Oh my goodness, we loved this apartment so much, we did not want to leave! Our wonderful experience in the Pool Party studio began when we met Ralf. We were fresh off a 20 hour bus ride and, as the apartment was vacant the night before, Ralf kindly allowed us to check in early. He met us at the apartment and gave us a detailed overview of the apartment and the neighborhood. He was very friendly and welcoming; he even left us with a beautiful bowl of fruit and cookies. It was a pleasure to meet him and read his entertaining and descriptive reviews of the local restaurants, which he kindly provides in an informative binder. He gave us great tips for a nearby brunch spot which was just what we needed after the bus ride. As for the apartment, it is absolutely gorgeous. It looks exactly like the photos: modern, spotless, and comfortable. It was awesome to have a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable bed, lovely bathroom, fast internet, and a cute porch. We also really appreciated the gym facilities on the 31st floor. What an amazing view! We peeked in on the jacuzzi and sauna (both looked really nice) but didn't have a chance to try them. It was too cold for us to enjoy the pool- next time! The apartment is located in a fabulous part of town; close to all of the cute shops and innovative restaurants for which Palermo is famous. We loved walking around the safe and friendly neighborhood. In summary, this apartment is an incredible bargain. We look forward to staying with Ralf on future visits to Buenos Aires!

Both Ralf & Marcelo were wonderful hosts.   The apartment is chic, modern, super safe, and clean which I loved.  The view is also absolutely incredible!!  I would definitely stay here again.  Thanks guys!!

We had such a great time in Buenos Aires and Ralf's place was a huge part of that!  The apartment is in an awesome location, close to many great shopping and dining locations in Palermo. We were greeted with a thorough explanation of the apartment amenities and things to do in the neighborhood by Tomas in excellent English. There was also a guide to recommended restaurants written by Ralf in the apartment, as well as many other great guides to eating and tourism around Buenos Aires. The apartment was clean and included great amenities, such as TV (with channels in both English and Spanish), speakers, plug adapters, and coffee maker. The balcony was also greatly enjoyed during our stay.  The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking meals if you'd like, although not eating out in Buenos Aires seems like a sin. Overall, the apartment setup was phenomenal and the location was ideal for our stay in Buenos Aires. My boyfriend and I will definitely be returning!

Our stay at Ralf's flat was great! The flat is beautiful and nicely located in a new high-rise building in Palermo with security, not far from bars, restaurants and shops, and nicely equipped with all one needs for a few days.
The listing was very accurate.  Very cute studio.  We wanted to stay in Palermo, so it was nice to be in a good spot.  It was also very secure.  We had a great time!

There was a problem with the heat/hot water in this unit, so Ralf informed us when we arrived that we were going to stay in a larger, 1-bedroom on a higher floor in the same building. I thought it was very nice and professional of him to arrange for that in advance of our arrival. I can't comment on this unit because I never saw it, but I can say that Ralf and his colleagues were very responsible and responsive hosts, that the unit we stayed in was in good condition with a great view of the city, and that the building itself is secure and updated. We also loved all of Ralf's restaurant recommendations!!

Ralf e Marcelo, gostaria de agradecer a atenção de vcs durante nossa estada em Buenos Aires. O apartamento é uma delicia, muito bem decorado e em ótima localização. Conseguimos nos movimentar pela cidade com facilidade. Recomendo vocês com certeza! Abraço

We booked the hotel for 2 nights. When we arrived at the apartment, Marcello waiting for us and it was 10.30pm! 
Marcello walked us through all the things in the apartment and gave us various suggestions. We managed to find a place for dinner just opposite the apartment at 11pm!
The same night we spotted a few tiny bugs on our bed and sent an email to inform the office. The next day Marcello came to solve the issue and was very apologetic. He moved us to another apartment in the same building, which was equally nice, so he can clean up the apartment.
Overall we had a very good experience and the location is fantastic!

Ralf's apartment was clean, comfortable, and in a great location with easy access to transportation. The whole team was really helpful and tried to be as accommodating as possible. We loved our time in Buenos Aires!

This apartment was incredible and in the most perfect location. It was exactly as the listing described. Ralf's team was also great. Marcelo met me at the apartment and was so thorough in making sure I felt comfortable and had everything I needed. I wish he could be present at every Airbnb I book.

Ralfs place is a great, clean, very well furnished and appointed apartment in a great location.

The check in was very easy and Marcelo was very friendly and explained everything in detail.

The best place I have stayed at in Buenos Aires.
Great apartment and great hosts. Best airbnb we have staying in. Very well organized from start to finish. Could not fault them or the apartment at all. Reasonably priced as well.

Todo es sumamente eficiente y funcional. La torre de departamentos está en muy bien estado y súper ubicada. Creo que es un buen deal en cuanto calidad precio. El trato es muy profesional y siempre están al pendiente. Nos gusto la experiencia.

Pool party is a lovely luxury apartment in a very cool area. This was a great place to stay on our first few nights in south america. Francesco helped us with advice about the area, transport etc. Thanks for everything.

My friend and I had a great time staying at this apartment. The apartment was clean and comfortable - beautiful and functional design with nice touches. We loved the deck and the pool as well! This place is in a stellar location - very close to many fun bars and restaurants. Place felt very secure with 24/7 security.

Very cosy apartment in a nice area to enjoy Palermo. The flat is very modern, and the building has a superb swimming pool and an amazing gym.  We were very well welcomed, with great tips about the city, restaurants and bars. Truly recommended !
